snippet: The owner Jimmy Haslam of the Cleveland Browns said Wednesday that he had no plans to fire General Manager Ray Farmer, who is at the center of a texting investigation by the N.F.L.
abstract: Cleveland Browns owner Jimmy Haslam says he will not fire general manager Ray Farmer, who broke league rules by sending text messages during games.
lead_paragraph: The owner Jimmy Haslam of the Cleveland Browns said Wednesday that he had no plans to fire General Manager Ray Farmer, who is at the center of a texting investigation by the N.F.L.
